definitions: the state of being distant from something else, in particular from the main centers of population

examples.text: the remoteness of the location hindered development

definitions: lack of connection with or relationship to something

examples.text: the remoteness of politics from everyday life

shortDefinitions: lack of connection with or relationship to something

definitions: the state of being unlikely to occur
shortDefinitions: state of being unlikely to occur

definitions: the quality of being aloof and unfriendly

examples.text: his diffidence could sometimes be misread as remoteness

shortDefinitions: quality of being aloof and unfriendly
